Author: ZiggyStardustWasHere
Text: Same.  My coworkers always try to get me to eat and are ALWAYS getting piles of food and inviting I eat it.   We have an XMAS potluck tomorrow and there will be Vegan Cupcakes, so I’ve been starving and exercising hella just to be able to try to eat normally around them.  It’s so anxiety inducing that I can’t sleep.

Author: whoisthis8295
Text: The easiest solution I’ve found for this when my students give me sweets for the holidays is to regift them. That way they don’t get wasted but I don’t have to eat them and I save money on gifts!
